Desc.entry: A non political, grassroots voluntary organisation which aims to champion the best in architecture and urban design for the city, bringing vision to the changing cityscape and campaigning for the protection and sensitive re-use of Sheffield's heritage. Open to all.

ContactName.entry: Paul Bedwell, Chair/Louise White, Vice Chair/Simon Gedye, Secretary/Liz Godfrey/Sarah Lock, Membership Secretaries
